title: Captain Huff and Harry: problem solving - consumer mathematics
creator_credit: Aesop Films and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: To fix her broken ship Captain Huff must buy new rivets and a rudder. At the store she uses a calculator to make unit price comparisons, a 10% discount, sales tax and delivery charges. An animated film. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
